name: Recurring Donations – Moneris gateway for Give
author: Alex Smith

sections.description: This plugin requires the GiveWP core and GiveWP Recurring add-on plugins activated to function properly. When activated, it adds the ability to accept recurring (subscription) donations to the Moneris payment gateways.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.5 or greater
  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 8.0 or greater
sections.changelog:
1.0.2: August 8th, 2021

  • Fixed changelog dates.

1.0.1: August 8th, 2021

  • Tested with newer versions of wordpress (5.8) and givewp (2.12.2).

1.0.0: November 16th, 2020

  • Initial plugin release. Yippee!

short_description: Enable recurring payments for Moneris gateway in the GiveWP donation plugin.
description: This plugin requires the GiveWP core and GiveWP Recurring add-on plugins activated to function properly. When activated, it adds the ability to accept recurring (subscription) donations to the Moneris payment gateways.
